毻字的基本解释

毻
tuò
鸟兽换毛：“毻毛新鹄小。”

毻字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tuì］［tuò］
［《廣韻》他外切，去泰，透。］
［《廣韻》湯卧切，去過，透。］
亦作“毤1”。
(1)鸟兽毛羽脱落换生新毛。
(2)泛指脱毛。参见“毤服”。

毻字的康熙字典解释

【辰集下】【毛字部】　毻； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页595第03
【廣韻】湯臥切【集韻】吐臥切，?音唾。【博雅】解也。謂鳥獸解毛羽也。【揚子·方言】隋、毻，易也。【郭註】謂解毻也。【郭璞·江賦】產毻積羽，往來勃碣。【註】毻，音唾，落毛也。與?同。【庾信·老子廟應詔詩】毻毛新鵠小。　又【玉篇】他果切，音妥。又【廣韻】他外切【集韻】吐外切，?音蛻。義?同。

毻字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
毻字的起名意思

暂无。

毻
Basic explanation of words
毻
tuò
Birds and beasts moult: "Xinhu Xiaomao is small."
毻
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tuì］［tuò］
["Guangyun" he cut outside, went to Thailand, and thoroughly. ]
["Guangyun" soup lying and cut, have been, thoroughly. ]
Also known as "毤1".
(1) The feathers of birds and animals shed new hairs.
(2) Generally refers to hair removal. See "Wufu".
毻
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Jixia] [Mao Character Department] 　毻; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 595 No. 03
[Guang Yun] Tang lying and cutting [Ji Yun] Spit lying and cutting, with sound saliva. [Bo Ya] Solution also. That the birds and beasts untie their feathers. [Yangtze Dialect] Sui, Luo, Yi Ye. [Guo's Note] Said Jie Shu also. [Guo Pu·Jiang Fu] Produce and accumulate feathers, and communicate with each other prosperously. [Note] 毻, sound saliva, hair loss also. Same as? 【Xin Yu·Lao Zi Temple Ying Zhao Poems】Huomao Xinhu Xiao.　[Jade Chapter] He is fruitful and sound. Also [Guang Yun] he cut out [Ji Yun] spit out and cut out the sound. Righteous? Same.
毻

to molt; to change the coat of animals; (Cant.) muddled, confused
